title.rendered: Ambassador Gabriel Aduda presented award for outstanding performance to 31 Members of Staff of the Ministry

content.rendered:
Today, 20th July, 2022, the Permanent Secretary, Ambassador Gabriel Aduda presented award for outstanding performance to 31 Members of Staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, as part of lined up activities to commemorate the Civil Service Day, in line with the directives of OHCSF.
In a similar vein, the Permanent Secretary received on behalf of the Ministry, 15 sets of jerseys and 2 footballs donated by Super Eagles Midfielder, Ogenyi Eddy Onazi to MFA football team.
